sourcesContent:
import { StyleSheet, Text, View,SafeAreaView, Picker, TextInput } from "react-native";
import React, { useState } from "react";

const Psofa = () => {
  const [pao2, setPao2] = useState("");
  const [spo2,setSpo2] = useState("");
  const [platelet,setPlatelet] = useState("")
  const [bilirubin,setBilirubin] = useState("")
  const [gcs,setGcs] = useState("")
  const [renal,setRenal] = useState("")
  const [age,setAge] = useState("")
  const [selectFlag, setSelectFlag] = useState("")
  
  let score;
  let flag = 0
  if((Number(pao2) >-1 && Number(spo2) >-1) && Number(platelet) >-1 && Number(bilirubin) >-1 && Number(gcs) >-1 && Number(renal) >-1){
      flag = 1
      score = Number(pao2)+Number(spo2)+Number(platelet)+Number(bilirubin)+Number(gcs)+Number(renal)
  }
  return (
    <SafeAreaView>
      <Text style={styles.prism}>
        Pediatric Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (P SOFA) Score
      </Text>
      <View style={[styles.container1]}>
        <View>
          <Text style={styles.assessment}>1.Respiratory</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
          <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Select: </Text>
          <Picker
            selectedValue={selectFlag}
            style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
            onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setSelectFlag(itemValue)}
          >
            <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
            <Picker.Item label=">=400" value={0} />
            <Picker.Item label="300-399" value={1} />
            <Picker.Item label="200-299" value={2} />
            <Picker.Item label="100-199 with respiratory support" value={3} />
            <Picker.Item label="<100 with respiratory support" value={4} />
          </Picker>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
          <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>PaO2:FiO2: </Text>
          <Picker
            selectedValue={pao2}
            style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
            onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setPao2(itemValue)}
          >
            <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
            <Picker.Item label=">=400" value={0} />
            <Picker.Item label="300-399" value={1} />
            <Picker.Item label="200-299" value={2} />
            <Picker.Item label="100-199 with respiratory support" value={3} />
            <Picker.Item label="<100 with respiratory support" value={4} />
          </Picker>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
          <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>SpO2:FiO2: </Text>
          <Picker
            selectedValue={spo2}
            style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
            onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setSpo2(itemValue)}
          >
            <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
            <Picker.Item label=">=292" value={0} />
            <Picker.Item label="264-291" value={1} />
            <Picker.Item label="221-264" value={2} />
            <Picker.Item label="148-220 with respiratory support" value={3} />
            <Picker.Item label="<148 with respiratory support" value={4} />
          </Picker>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={[styles.container2]}>
        <View>
          <Text style={styles.assessment}>2.Coagulation</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
          <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Platelet Count: </Text>
          <Picker
            selectedValue={platelet}
            style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
            onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setPlatelet(itemValue)}
          >
            <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
            <Picker.Item label=">=150" value={0} />
            <Picker.Item label="100-149" value={1} />
            <Picker.Item label="50-99" value={2} />
            <Picker.Item label="20-49" value={3} />
            <Picker.Item label="<20" value={4} />
          </Picker>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={[styles.container3]}>
        <View>
          <Text style={styles.assessment}>3.Hepatic</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
          <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Bilirubin (mg/dL): </Text>
          <Picker
            selectedValue={bilirubin}
            style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
            onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setBilirubin(itemValue)}
          >
            <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
            <Picker.Item label="<1.2" value={0} />
            <Picker.Item label="1.2-1.9" value={1} />
            <Picker.Item label="2.0-5.9" value={2} />
            <Picker.Item label="6.0-11.9" value={3} />
            <Picker.Item label=">=12.0" value={4} />
          </Picker>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={[styles.container4]}>
        <View>
          <Text style={styles.assessment}>4.Cardiovascular</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
          <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>MAP by age group or vasoactive infusion: </Text>
          {/* <Picker
            selectedValue={bilirubin}
            style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
            onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setBilirubin(itemValue)}
          >
            <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
            <Picker.Item label="<1.2" value={0} />
            <Picker.Item label="1.2-1.9" value={1} />
            <Picker.Item label="2.0-5.9" value={2} />
            <Picker.Item label="6.0-11.9" value={3} />
            <Picker.Item label=">=12.0" value={4} />
          </Picker> */}
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={[styles.container5]}>
        <View>
          <Text style={styles.assessment}>5.Neurological</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
          <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>GCS: </Text>
          <Picker
            selectedValue={gcs}
            style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
            onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setGcs(itemValue)}
          >
            <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
            <Picker.Item label="15" value={0} />
            <Picker.Item label="13-14" value={1} />
            <Picker.Item label="10-12" value={2} />
            <Picker.Item label="6-9" value={3} />
            <Picker.Item label="<6" value={4} />
          </Picker>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={[styles.container2]}>
        <View>
          <Text style={styles.assessment}>6.Renal</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
          <Text style={[styles.dropdownContent, styles.text]}>Creatinine by age group (mg/dL)   </Text>
          <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Select Age-Group: </Text>
          <Picker
            placeholder="Select Age Group"
            selectedValue={age}
            style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
            onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setAge(itemValue)}
          >
            <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
            <Picker.Item label="<1 mo" value={0} />
            <Picker.Item label="1-11 mo" value={1} />
            <Picker.Item label="12-23 mo" value={2} />
            <Picker.Item label="24-59" value={3} />
            <Picker.Item label="60-143 mo" value={4} />
            <Picker.Item label="144-216 mo" value={5} />
            <Picker.Item label=">216 mo" value={6} />
          </Picker>
        </View>
        {age ==0 && (
          <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
            <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Creatinine: </Text>
            <Picker
              selectedValue={renal}
              style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
              onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setRenal(itemValue)}
            >
                <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
              <Picker.Item label="<0.8" value={0} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.8-0.9" value={1} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.0-1.1" value={2} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.2-1.5" value={3} />
              <Picker.Item label=">=1.6" value={4} />
            </Picker>
          </View>
        )}
        {age ==1 && (
          <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
            <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Creatinine: </Text>
            <Picker
              selectedValue={renal}
              style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
              onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setRenal(itemValue)}
            >
                <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
              <Picker.Item label="<0.3" value={0} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.3-0.4" value={1} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.5-0.7" value={2} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.8-1.1" value={3} />
              <Picker.Item label=">=1.2" value={4} />
            </Picker>
          </View>
        )}
        {age ==2 && (
          <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
            <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Creatinine: </Text>
            <Picker
              selectedValue={renal}
              style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
              onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setRenal(itemValue)}
            >
                <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
              <Picker.Item label="<0.4" value={0} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.4-0.5" value={1} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.6-1.0" value={2} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.1-1.4" value={3} />
              <Picker.Item label=">=1.5" value={4} />
            </Picker>
          </View>
        )}
        {age ==3 && (
          <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
            <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Creatinine: </Text>
            <Picker
              selectedValue={renal}
              style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
              onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setRenal(itemValue)}
            >
                <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
              <Picker.Item label="<0.6" value={0} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.6-0.8" value={1} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.9-1.5" value={2} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.6-2.2" value={3} />
              <Picker.Item label=">=2.3" value={4} />
            </Picker>
          </View>
        )}
        {age ==4 && (
          <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
            <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Creatinine: </Text>
            <Picker
              selectedValue={renal}
              style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
              onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setRenal(itemValue)}
            >
                <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
              <Picker.Item label="<0.7" value={0} />
              <Picker.Item label="0.7-1.0" value={1} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.1-1.7" value={2} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.8-2.5" value={3} />
              <Picker.Item label=">=2.6" value={4} />
            </Picker>
          </View>
        )}
        {age ==5 && (
          <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
            <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Creatinine: </Text>
            <Picker
              selectedValue={renal}
              style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
              onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setRenal(itemValue)}
            >
                <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
              <Picker.Item label="<1.0" value={0} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.0-1.6" value={1} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.7-2.8" value={2} />
              <Picker.Item label="2.9-4.1" value={3} />
              <Picker.Item label=">=4.2" value={4} />
            </Picker>
          </View>
        )}
        {age ==6 && (
          <View style={styles.dropContainer}>
            <Text style={styles.dropdownContent}>Creatinine: </Text>
            <Picker
              selectedValue={renal}
              style={{ height: 50, width: 150 }}
              onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setRenal(itemValue)}
            >
                <Picker.Item label="" value={-1} />
              <Picker.Item label="<1.2" value={0} />
              <Picker.Item label="1.2-1.9" value={1} />
              <Picker.Item label="2.0-3.4" value={2} />
              <Picker.Item label="3.5-4.9" value={3} />
              <Picker.Item label=">=4.5" value={4} />
            </Picker>
          </View>
        )}
      </View>
      {flag == 1 && (
        <View style={[styles.container4]}>
          <View>
            <Text style={styles.assessment}>
              Score: {score}
            </Text>
          </View>
        </View>
      )}
    </SafeAreaView>
  );
};

export default Psofa;

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  prism: {
    fontSize: 50,
    fontWeight: "bold",
    textAlign: "center",
  },
  assessment: {
    marginTop: 20,
    fontSize: 30,
    fontWeight: "bold",
  },
  dropContainer: {
    flexDirection: "row",
    marginBottom: 20,
    marginTop: 10,
  },
  dropdownContent: {
    fontSize: 20,
    marginTop: 10,
  },
  input: {
    height: 40,
    margin: 12,
    borderWidth: 1,
    padding: 10,
    width: 200,
  },
  text: {
    fontWeight: "bold",
  },
  container1: {
    backgroundColor: "#f0ffff",
    paddingLeft: 20,
    borderWidth: 2,
    margin: 5,
  },
  container2: {
    backgroundColor: "#fffacd",
    paddingLeft: 20,
    borderWidth: 2,
    margin: 5,
  },
  container3: {
    backgroundColor: "#ffb6c1",
    paddingLeft: 20,
    borderWidth: 2,
    margin: 5,
  },
  container4: {
    backgroundColor: "#f5f5dc",
    paddingLeft: 20,
    borderWidth: 2,
    margin: 5,
  },
  container5: {
    backgroundColor: "#dda0dd",
    paddingLeft: 20,
    borderWidth: 2,
    margin: 5,
  },
  subscore: {
    fontWeight: "bold",
    borderWidth: 1,
    backgroundColor: "#fff",
    margin: 10,
    padding: 4,
    fontSize: 20,
  },
});
